extendedIngredients.name: chicken
extendedIngredients.originalString: 2½ cups grilled chicken, cut into strips

extendedIngredients.name: hot sauce
extendedIngredients.originalString: ¾ cup Buffalo Sauce or Hot Sauce

recipes.title: Buffalo Chicken Spring Rolls #SundaySupper

winePairing.pairingText: Spring Rolls on the menu? Try pairing with Sparkling rosé and Sparkling Wine. If you're serving a selection of appetizers, you can't go wrong with these. Both are very food friendly and complement a variety of flavors. The Bellissima Sparkling rosé with a 4.5 out of 5 star rating seems like a good match. It costs about 24 dollars per bottle.

productMatches.title: Bellissima Sparkling Rose
productMatches.description: This is an elegant, bright rosé, with hints of strawberry and grapefruit, and a soft, persistent foam. Uncorked at the very last minute, Bellissima Sparkling Rosé pairs perfectly with smoked salmon, shellfish, and seafood hor d’oeuvres such as tuna tartare, sushi, and sashimi.

recipes.instructions: In a small bowl, mix together the rice, buffalo sauce and crumbed blue cheese.Wet your rice wrappers for 10 seconds and place on a flat surface. I do this individually for each one and then fill it, then start again with another.Layer the rice first, then top with chicken then top that with shredded lettuce. Carefully roll spring rolls up.Refrigerate for about an hour.They are awesome either chilled or can be eaten right when you first roll them up.

steps.step: In a small bowl, mix together the rice, buffalo sauce and crumbed blue cheese.Wet your rice wrappers for 10 seconds and place on a flat surface. I do this individually for each one and then fill it, then start again with another.Layer the rice first, then top with chicken then top that with shredded lettuce. Carefully roll spring rolls up.Refrigerate for about an hour.They are awesome either chilled or can be eaten right when you first roll them up.
